mapper.select: SELECT * FROM category WHERE parent_id IS NULL AND is_visible = 1 ORDER BY sort_order ASC
SELECT * FROM category WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND is_visible = 1 ORDER BY sort_order ASC
SELECT * FROM category WHERE is_visible = 1 ORDER BY category_path ASC, sort_order ASC
SELECT * FROM category WHERE level = #{level} AND is_visible = 1 ORDER BY sort_order ASC

SELECT p.category_id as parentId, p.name as parentName, p.sort_order as parentSort, c.category_id as childId, c.name as childName, c.sort_order as childSort FROM category p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.parent_id AND c.is_visible = 1 WHERE p.parent_id IS NULL AND p.is_visible = 1 ORDER BY p.sort_order ASC, c.sort_order ASC

SELECT c.category_id as categoryId, c.name as categoryName, p.product_id as productId, p.name as productName, p.price, p.thumbnail_file_id as thumbnailFileId FROM category c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_id, category_id, name, price, thumbnail_file_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY category_id ORDER BY created_at DESC) as rn FROM product WHERE is_visible = 1 ) p ON c.category_id = p.category_id AND p.rn <= 4 WHERE c.parent_id IS NULL AND c.is_visible = 1 ORDER BY c.sort_order ASC, p.rn ASC
SELECT category_id as categoryId, name, level FROM category WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND is_visible = 1 ORDER BY level ASC, sort_order ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT category_id, name, depth, parent_id FROM category WHERE depth = 1 ORDER BY name
SELECT category_id, name, depth, parent_id FROM category WHERE depth = 2 AND parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY name
SELECT category_id, name, depth, parent_id FROM category WHERE depth = 3 AND parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY name
